species.name: igglybuff
descriptions: Igglybuff has a soft and plushy body that feels very much like a marshmallow. From this body wafts a gently sweet fragrance that soothes and calms the emotions of its foes.
Igglybuff loves to sing. Its marshmallow-like body gives off a faint sweet smell.
IGGLYBUFF’s vocal chords are not sufficiently developed. It would hurt its throat if it were to sing too much. This Pokémon gargles with freshwater from a clean stream.
Instead of walking with its short legs, it moves around by bouncing on its soft, tender body.
It has a soft and bouncy body. Once it starts bouncing, it becomes impossible to stop.

abilities.name: cute-charm
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of infatuating attacking Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: competitive
abilities.effect: Raises Special Attack by two stages upon having any stat lowered.

abilities.name: friend-guard
abilities.effect: Decreases all direct damage taken by friendly Pokémon to 0.75×.
